text: "Blame It on the Rain" is a song by Milli Vanilli. It was released in summer 1989. The song was their third and last Billboard Hot 100 number one hit before their lip synching scandal. The club mix version of the song was on their album All or Nothing. It hit number one in November 1989 and stayed there for two weeks. ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Milli Vanilli songs
title: Blame It on the Rain
